Package cs4b.proj1.observer

Interface IObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardGUI, DebugObserver, EventContainer, Game, HPCLocal, Main, Player, SubjectAssistantTest.TestObs
    public interface IObserver
    Implementors are able to observer ISubject objects.
    Author:
    Daniel Edwards
    See Also:
    ISubject

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void update​(java.lang.Object eventInfo)
      Let the observer know that something happened with one of its subjects.

      • update

        void update​(java.lang.Object eventInfo)
        Let the observer know that something happened with one of its subjects.
        Parameters:
        eventInfo - Whatever the subject decides to share about the event.
